name: 黃如瑩
objective: 本課程藉由不同情境來提供一個英語談話的時空，使學生能學習合宜的詞句與溝通技巧。採用小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告為主要教學技巧，其能增強學生之聽說能力、溝通技巧與良好的自我表達習慣。
schedule:
Unit One:  Talking about Taiwan (I)
Week 1 Sports and Activities
Week 2 Tourist Places
Week 3 Holidays
Week 4 Souvenirs and Gifts
Unit Two:  Talking about Taiwan (II)
Week 5 Religion and Folk Medicine
Week 6 Palace Museum
Week 7 History of Taiwan
Week 8 Democracy
Unit Three:  Mid-term Oral presentation
Week 9 Oral presentation
Unit Four: Traveling Overseas (I)
Week 10 Foreign Countries
Week 11 Overseas Travel
Week 12 Airline Travel
Week 13 The Hotel
Unit Five: Traveling Overseas (II)
Week 14 The Restaurant
Week 15 Directions
Week 16 Shopping for Clothes
Week 17 Shopping Overseas
Unit Six:  Oral presentation of final Projects
Week 18  Presentation of final projects
